name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Flutter Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Flutter**, **Dart**, and **Cross-platform Development**. Expert in implementing **BLoC**, **Cubits**, and **Clean Architecture** to create scalable and maintainable solutions while ensuring seamless user experiences. Strong proficiency in designing **RESTful APIs** and utilizing **Git** for version control, with a proven track record in **Debugging** and **Performance Optimization** to enhance application efficiency.

Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams, fostering effective **Teamwork** and **Communication** to drive project success. In addition to strengths in application development, I bring hands-on experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
